name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to netizens, many accounts that live-broadcast the Fuzhou flood have been shut down.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A famous patriotic V said that Japan donated 4 million euros to the International Atomic Energy Agency under various names, so the International Atomic Energy Agency is not trustworthy.
When a netizen pointed out that China paid 52.32 million euros and 8.45 million US dollars in membership fees to the International Atomic Energy Agency in 2023, the highest among all countries in the world, he deleted and blocked it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Shanghai Jiaotong University launched the "Red Army Meal"
The content is fried meat with bamboo shoots, sweet potato leaves, pumpkin soup, and two of three choices: steamed corn, corn, and sweet potato.
Each portion is priced at 10 yuan, reminding students to remember the bitter past and think about the sweet future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of September 6, the owners of Xiyuan Guannanshan in Banan District, Chongqing, protested due to the unfinished construction of the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/O8px5B4DbD

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 6, some media said that the Shenyang property market provided a subsidy of 200 yuan per square meter for college students to buy houses.
A 120-square-meter residence can receive a subsidy of 24,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added follow-up to the incident

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 6, the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League published an article titled "Japan is still in the queue. What do you think and what should you do?" to distance itself from anti-Japanese patriotic behavior.
It said that those who shouted "Down with the little Japan" and incited "taking to the streets" online had ulterior motives and were either stupid or bad, or even stupid and bad.
It called on the public not to boycott seafood indiscriminately and not to punish ourselves with Japan's mistakes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On September 6, at Humen High-speed Railway Station in Dongguan City, a man was so emotional that he stood on the table and yelled because his power bank was confiscated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hu Xijin commented on the incident

name: 李老师不是你老师

content: Uh...On September 6, Xi'an police reported that a man was administratively detained by the public security organs for fabricating the rumor that "the guest of Mayday's Xi'an concert was Wang Junkai."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 5, Fujian water situation summary

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of September 2, Xi Rui, president of China View Network, released a video, saying that since the epidemic was relaxed, the entire social environment remained the same, or even worse, and he felt desperate about society and decided to leave first.
In the early morning of the 3rd, he was found to have committed suicide by jumping from the 24th floor of his home.
Xi Rui's real name is Gu Dong'an. He was a writer and media person. He was 58 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xi Rui posted a long article on WeChat Moments

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Here, I strongly urge everyone not to give up life easily. Suicide cannot solve the problem. On the contrary, it will bring irreparable harm and pain to yourself and the people around you. Any pressure is only temporary. If you feel depressed, helpless, and desperate, you can try to talk to your friends, psychologists, and anyone you trust. Please realize that life is precious and don't give up easily.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that the introduction of the "house recognition but not loan recognition" policy in various places has triggered a wave of selling.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 6, a fire broke out in a high-rise building near Taikoo Li in Chengdu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 6, at Daqing West Railway Station, police checked mobile phones one by one, registered ID cards, and required people to install anti-fraud apps.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, CCTV released a video of US Commerce Secretary Raymondo endorsing Huawei Mate60, claiming that the poster was "made by netizens and circulated wildly in foreign media."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, I received a Google warning in my submission email: government-backed attackers may be trying to steal my password.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, in the Xingfucheng community in Guantao County, Handan City, Hebei Province, the owners organized a protest because the building had been unfinished for many years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
To add, this is the pop-up warning when I switched to the submission mailbox.
But because I have taken measures to protect the login before, no abnormalities have been found so far.
At the same time, my personal website https://t.co/sTvgc86rNM has also been tampered with by someone’s password and login application

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, the canteen of Inner Mongolia University was suspected of food safety issues. It was recently punished by the Market Supervision Administration for using duck meat to impersonate beef and mutton for sale.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I just consulted a professional, this is an attack identified by Google, but because I have set up multiple protection mechanisms, there is no leakage problem. In addition, the submission mailbox will be completely cleared every other day, so don't worry.
However, I emphasize again
Do not use your domestic email to submit
Do not use your domestic email to register Twitter

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
After not allowing Tesla to enter the office area, China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation has now banned employees from using Apple and Samsung phones and organized an internal purchase meeting for Huawei phones.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, a student from Guilin Xing'an Normal School posted that the school used the campus mobile phone supervision software "Shuyubang" to remotely monitor students' mobile phones and would check them every day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the homepage of Shuyubang's official website, you can see the introduction page of the "Campus Mobile Phone/Tablet Management System".
The introduction says that it can "easily manage the mobile phones of all students in the school"
